articles.title: World Brain Tumour Day: Can mobile phones and radiation cause brain tumours?
articles.description: On World Brain Tumour Day, experts highlight the importance of early detection and awareness of brain tumour symptoms, causes, and myths. Brain tumours, whether benign or malignant, require timely diagnosis and treatment. Lifestyle factors, radiation exposure and mobile phone use remain under study while advances in surgery and therapy offer hope for effective management and recovery.
